Last night in Germany the band played In My Place for kmetsch. Coming to a UK/European show? Submit your request and your song could be chosen! 

Here's what you need to do…

– Record a short video (15 seconds or less) of yourself on a plain background telling us which Coldplay song you'd like the band to play.

– Please record your video in the local language of where the show is. Please don't have any music playing too – just you talking.

– Don't forget to tell us why you'd like to hear your chosen song.

– Upload your video to Instagram with the name of your chosen song as a hashtag (ie #TheScientist) PLUS the appropriate show hashtag from below (only one show hashtag per post, please). If you're going to a show in a city which has more than one show, please also tell us which date you're going to.

#ManchesterRequest
#GlasgowRequest
#ZurichRequest
#WembleyRequest
#AmsterdamRequest
#GlastonburyRequest
#BerlinRequest
#HamburgRequest
#StockholmRequest
#CopenhagenRequest

status_message: The third single from A Head Full Of Dreams is Up&Up! The brand new radio edit is available now - listen on Spotify below or download from iTunes at http://smarturl.it/getupandup

This is one example of some of the beautiful gifts some of you made for us in Latin America
We will try to come to as many places as we can over this tour
Love
Coldplay

We are so lucky to get to play for you all

Especially when there is so much going on in the world that makes concerts impossible

We send our love to those in Japan and Ecuador who are dealing with the Earthquakes

And we would like to say Thankyou to all of you who came to the shows, or came to say hello, in Latin America.

You made us feel very special

Love
Chris

- Are you coming to the show in Buenos Aires tomorrow? Is there a song you'd like to hear? Then please send us a video on Instagram (filmed on a blank background) using #buenosairesREQUEST, telling us which Coldplay song you'd like to request and why (in Spanish or English). 
- ¿Van a venir al concierto de Buenos Aires de mañana? ¿Qué canción les gustaría escuchar en vivo? Si es así, graben un video en instagram (con un fondo blanco) y súbanlo con el hashtag #buenosairesREQUEST diciendo qué canción quieren pedir y por qué (la petición puede ser en inglés o en español)

status_message: Beyoncé's pics from the Hymn For The Weekend video shoot. (Watch the finished video at https://youtu.be/YykjpeuMNEk)

I think I speak for the whole band when I say that we will really miss seeing and talking with Sir George. He was a true gentleman, a funny and kind man, and a real legend, and it was always such a pleasure to see him at Air studios. We would like to send our love to his family and also all of those who worked with him, who will be missing him too. CM
The Hymn For The Weekend video ft Beyoncé has reached 100 million views! Incredible. Thank you. #HFTW
link_name: Coldplay - Hymn For The Weekend (Official video)

status_message:
We're pleased to announce that Geert Hagelaar from the Netherlands is the selected artist for our recent T-shirt contest with Talenthouse. The design is available to pre-order now at http://cldp.ly/peacockT 

The band loved Geert's peacock design – inspired by the bird's appearance in the Hymn For The Weekend video – with its clever use of the colour spectrum, as featured across the A Head Full Of Dreams artwork.

We'd like to thank everyone who submitted a design. We were blown away by the standard of the entries, and it wasn't easy to select a winner.

Hymn For The Weekend, the new single, out now! 
~ iTunes --> http://cldp.ly/HFTWdownload
~ Spotify --> http://cldp.ly/HFTWspotify
